summary: TOOKA NEW 2017 STREET GLIDE SPECIAL BIKE IN FOR 1K SERVICE AND I WAS TOLD THE LEFT REAR SHOCK WAS LEAKING AND IT WOULD BE AVAL. IN A COUPLE OF DAYS. SO I HAD TO RIDE IT 25 MILES TO MY HOME. SEVERAL DAY LATER I CALLED AND SPOKE W/ CHIP THE SERVICE ADVISOR AND HE STATED THAT IS WAS STILL ON HAD NOT COME IN. CALLED THIS MORNING NOW I BEING TOLD 10 JULY. I ASKED TO SEE IF THEY COULD GET IT SOONER. BECAUSE I HAVE A ROAD TRIP ON THE 12 JULY AND THE MONIES ARE NONREFUNDABLE. I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO WAIT A WEEK OR MORE FOR PARTS FOR A BRAND NEW MOTORCYCLE.
